title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 156.7 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 156.7 - Fees

State Regulations

The Comptroller may collect fees from account owners and
financial organizations serving as account depositaries and managers of the

Program to cover expenses of operating and administering the Program as are
deemed necessary in his or her discretion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
156.7

Adopted

New

York State Register July 12, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 28, eff. 7/12/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
